properties.Description: Action rule properties defining scope, conditions, suppression logic for action rule

scope.Description: Target scope for a given action rule. By default scope will be the subscription. User can also provide list of resource groups or list of resources from the scope subscription as well.

conditions.Description: Conditions in alert instance to be matched for a given action rule. Default value is all. Multiple values could be provided with comma separation.

createdAt.Description: Creation time of action rule. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

lastModifiedAt.Description: Last updated time of action rule. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

status.Description: Indicates if the given action rule is enabled or disabled.

values.Description: list of ARM IDs of the given scope type which will be the target of the given action rule.

severity.Description: condition to trigger an action rule

monitorService.Description: condition to trigger an action rule

monitorCondition.Description: condition to trigger an action rule

targetResourceType.Description: condition to trigger an action rule

alertRuleId.Description: condition to trigger an action rule

description.Description: condition to trigger an action rule

alertContext.Description: condition to trigger an action rule

values.Description: list of values to match for a given condition.

suppressionConfig.Description: Suppression logic for a given action rule

recurrenceType.Description: Specifies when the suppression should be applied.

schedule.Description: Schedule for a given suppression configuration.

recurrenceValues.Description: Specifies the values for recurrence pattern

actionGroupId.Description: Action group to trigger if action rule matches

type.Description: Action rule with action group configuration
